name: The Trillium Center at Baptist Health Corbin
description: Inpatient adult behavioral health unit providing 24-hour psychiatric care for adults 18 and older. Treats complex mental illness including depression, bipolar disorder, anxiety, schizophrenia, and dual-diagnosis addictive disorders. Offers comprehensive treatment including medication management, individual and group therapy, and discharge planning.
source: Verified from official website and multiple sources
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 365 days a year
eligibility_requirements: Adults 18 years and older who require 24-hour nursing care and cannot be treated in a less intense setting
populations_served: Adults with complex mental illness, substance abuse disorders, dual diagnosis
cost_information: Accepts insurance. Contact for specific coverage and payment information.
